00033 
00034 SOLDIERINITNODE *gSoldierInitHead = NULL;
00035 SOLDIERINITNODE *gSoldierInitTail = NULL;

00037 SOLDIERINITNODE *gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = NULL;
00038 SOLDIERINITNODE *gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = NULL;

00045 UINT32 CountNumberOfNodesWithSoldiers()
00046 {
00047       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00048       UINT32 num = 0;
00049       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00050       while( curr )
00051       {
00052             if( curr->pSoldier )
00053             {
00054                   num++;
00055             }
00056             curr = curr->next;
00057       }
00058       return num;
00059 }

00063 void InitSoldierInitList()
00064 {
00065       if( gSoldierInitHead )
00066         KillSoldierInitList();
00067       gSoldierInitHead = NULL;
00068       gSoldierInitTail = NULL;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void KillSoldierInitList()
00072 {
00073   while( gSoldierInitHead )
00074             RemoveSoldierNodeFromInitList( gSoldierInitTail );
00075       if( gfOriginalList )
00076             gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = NULL;
00077       else
00078             gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = NULL;
00079 }
00080 
00081 SOLDIERINITNODE* AddBasicPlacementToSoldierInitList( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT *pBasicPlacement )
00082 {
00083       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00084       //Allocate memory for node
00085       curr = (SOLDIERINITNODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof (SOLDIERINITNODE ) );
00086       Assert( curr );
00087       memset( curr, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERINITNODE ) );
00088 
00089       //Allocate memory for basic placement
00090       curr->pBasicPlacement = ( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT* )MemAlloc( sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00091       if( !curr->pBasicPlacement )
00092       {
00093             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for AddBasicPlacementToSoldierInitList." );
00094             return NULL;
00095       }
00096 
00097       //Copy memory for basic placement
00098       memcpy( curr->pBasicPlacement, pBasicPlacement, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00099 
00100       //It is impossible to set up detailed placement stuff now.  
00101       //If there is any detailed placement information during map load, it will be added
00102       //immediately after this function call.
00103       curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
00104       curr->pSoldier = NULL;
00105 
00106       //Insert the new node in the list in its proper place.
00107       if( !gSoldierInitHead )
00108       {
00109             gSoldierInitHead = curr;
00110             if( gfOriginalList )
00111                   gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = curr;
00112             else
00113                   gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = curr;
00114             gSoldierInitTail = curr;
00115             gSoldierInitHead->next = NULL;
00116             gSoldierInitHead->prev = NULL;
00117       }
00118       else
00119       {
00120             //TEMP:  no sorting, just enemies
00121             curr->prev = gSoldierInitTail;
00122             curr->next = NULL;
00123             gSoldierInitTail->next = curr;
00124             gSoldierInitTail = gSoldierInitTail->next;
00125       }
00126       if( gfOriginalList )
00127             gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals++;
00128       return curr;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void RemoveSoldierNodeFromInitList( SOLDIERINITNODE *pNode )
00132 {
00133       if( !pNode )
00134             return;
00135       if( gfOriginalList )
00136             gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals--;
00137       if( pNode->pBasicPlacement )
00138       {
00139             MemFree( pNode->pBasicPlacement );
00140             pNode->pBasicPlacement = NULL;
00141       }
00142       if( pNode->pDetailedPlacement )
00143       {
00144             MemFree( pNode->pDetailedPlacement );
00145             pNode->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
00146       }
00147       if( pNode->pSoldier )
00148       {
00149             if( pNode->pSoldier->ubID >= 20 )
00150             {
00151                   TacticalRemoveSoldier( pNode->pSoldier->ubID );
00152             }
00153             else
00154             {
00155                   INT8 bug = 0;
00156             }
00157       }
00158       if( pNode == gSoldierInitHead )
00159       {
00160             gSoldierInitHead = gSoldierInitHead->next;
00161             if( gSoldierInitHead )
00162                   gSoldierInitHead->prev = NULL;
00163             if( gfOriginalList )
00164                   gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00165             else
00166                   gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00167       }
00168       else if( pNode == gSoldierInitTail )
00169       {
00170             gSoldierInitTail = gSoldierInitTail->prev;
00171             gSoldierInitTail->next = NULL;
00172       }
00173       else
00174       {
00175             pNode->prev->next = pNode->next;
00176             pNode->next->prev = pNode->prev;
00177       }
00178       MemFree( pNode );
00179 }

00181 //These serialization functions are assuming the passing of a valid file 
00182 //pointer to the beginning of the save/load area, which is not necessarily at
00183 //the beginning of the file.  This is just a part of the whole map serialization.
00184 BOOLEAN SaveSoldiersToMap( HWFILE fp )
00185 {
00186       UINT32 i;
00187       UINT32 uiBytesWritten;
00188       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00189       
00190       if( !fp )
00191             return FALSE;
00192 
00193       if( gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals > MAX_INDIVIDUALS )    
00194             return FALSE;
00195 
00196       //If we are perhaps in the alternate version of the editor, we don't want bad things to
00197       //happen.  This is probably the only place I know where the user gets punished now.  If the 
00198       //person was in the alternate editor mode, then decided to save the game, the current mercs may
00199       //not be there.  This would be bad.  What we do is override any merc editing done while in this
00200       //mode, and kill them all, while replacing them with the proper ones.  Not only that, the alternate
00201       //editing mode is turned off, and if intentions are to play the game, the user will be facing many
00202       //enemies!
00203       #ifdef JA2EDITOR
00204             if( !gfOriginalList )
00205                   ResetAllMercPositions();
00206       #endif
00207       
00208       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00209       for( i=0; i < gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals; i++ )
00210       {
00211             if( !curr )
00212                   return FALSE;
00213             curr->ubNodeID = (UINT8)i;
00214             FileWrite( fp, curr->pBasicPlacement, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiBytesWritten );
00215 
00216             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement )
00217             {
00218                   if( !curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00219                         return FALSE;
00220                   FileWrite( fp, curr->pDetailedPlacement, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiBytesWritten );
00221 
00222             }
00223             curr = curr->next;
00224       }
00225       return TRUE;
00226 }

00230 BOOLEAN LoadSoldiersFromMap( INT8 **hBuffer )
00231 {
00232       UINT32 i;
00233       UINT8 ubNumIndividuals;
00234       BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT tempBasicPlacement;
00235       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT tempDetailedPlacement;
00236       SOLDIERINITNODE *pNode;
00237       BOOLEAN fCowInSector = FALSE;
00238 
00239       ubNumIndividuals = gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals;
00240 
00241       UseEditorAlternateList();
00242       KillSoldierInitList();
00243       UseEditorOriginalList();
00244       KillSoldierInitList();
00245       
00246       InitSoldierInitList();
00247 
00248       if( ubNumIndividuals > MAX_INDIVIDUALS )  
00249       {
00250             AssertMsg( 0, "Corrupt map check failed.  ubNumIndividuals is greater than MAX_INDIVIDUALS." );
00251             return FALSE; //too many mercs
00252       }
00253       if( !ubNumIndividuals ) 
00254       {
00255             return TRUE; //no mercs
00256       }
00257       
00258       //Because we are loading the map, we needed to know how many
00259       //guys are being loaded, but when we add them to the list here, it
00260       //automatically increments that number, effectively doubling it, which
00261       //would be a problem.  Now that we know the number, we clear it here, so
00262       //it gets built again.
00263       gMapInformation.ubNumIndividuals = 0;           //MUST BE CLEARED HERE!!!
00264 
00265       for( i=0; i < ubNumIndividuals; i++ )
00266       {
00267             LOADDATA( &tempBasicPlacement, *hBuffer, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00268             pNode = AddBasicPlacementToSoldierInitList( &tempBasicPlacement );
00269             pNode->ubNodeID = (UINT8)i;
00270             if( !pNode )
00271             {
00272                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for new basic placement in LoadSoldiersFromMap." );
00273                   return FALSE;
00274             }
00275             if( tempBasicPlacement.fDetailedPlacement )
00276             { //Add the static detailed placement information in the same newly created node as the basic placement.
00277                   //read static detailed placement from file
00278                   LOADDATA( &tempDetailedPlacement, *hBuffer, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00279                   //allocate memory for new static detailed placement
00280                   pNode->pDetailedPlacement = (SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00281                   if( !pNode->pDetailedPlacement )
00282                   {
00283                         AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for new detailed placement in LoadSoldiersFromMap." );
00284                         return FALSE;
00285                   }
00286                   //copy the file information from temp var to node in list.
00287                   memcpy( pNode->pDetailedPlacement, &tempDetailedPlacement, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00288 
00289                   if( tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00290                   {
00291                         pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubCivilianGroup = gMercProfiles[ tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile ].ubCivilianGroup;
00292                         pNode->pBasicPlacement->ubCivilianGroup = gMercProfiles[ tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile ].ubCivilianGroup;
00293                   }
00294             }
00295             if( tempBasicPlacement.bBodyType == COW )
00296             {
00297                   fCowInSector = TRUE;
00298             }
00299       }
00300       if( fCowInSector )
00301       {
00302             UINT8 str[ 40 ];
00303             sprintf( (char *)str, "Sounds\\\\cowmoo%d.wav", Random( 3 ) + 1 );
00304             PlayJA2SampleFromFile( (STR8) str, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00305       }
00306       return TRUE;
00307 }
00308 
00309 //Because soldiers, creatures, etc., maybe added to the game at anytime theoretically, the
00310 //list will need to be sorted to reflect this.  It is quite likely that this won't be needed,
00311 //but the flexibility is there just incase.  Now the list is sorted in the following manner:
00312 //-1st priority:  Any nodes containing valid pointers to soldiers are moved to the end of the list.
00313 //                                              We don't ever want to use two identical placements.
00314 //-2nd priority:  Any nodes that have priority existance and detailed placement information are
00315 //                                              put first in the list.
00316 //-3rd priority:  Any nodes that have priority existance and no detailed placement information are used next.
00317 //-4th priority:  Any nodes that have detailed placement and no priority existance information are used next.
00318 //-5th priority:  The rest of the nodes are basic placements and are placed in the center of the list.  Of
00319 //                                              these, they are randomly filled based on the number needed.
00320 //NOTE:  This function is called by AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld().  There is no other place it needs to
00321 //                 be called.
00322 void SortSoldierInitList()
00323 {
00324       SOLDIERINITNODE *temp, *curr;
00325 
00326       BOOLEAN     fFredoAtStart = FALSE;
00327       BOOLEAN     fFredoAtEnd = FALSE;
00328 
00329       if( !gSoldierInitHead )
00330             return;
00331 
00332       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00333       while( curr )
00334       {
00335             if ( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile == FREDO )
00336             {
00337                   fFredoAtStart = TRUE;
00338                   break;
00339             }
00340             curr = curr->next;
00341       }
00342 
00343       //1st priority sort 
00344       curr = gSoldierInitTail;
00345       while( curr )
00346       {
00347             if( curr->pSoldier && curr != gSoldierInitTail )
00348             {     //This node has an existing soldier, so move to end of list.
00349                   //copy node
00350                   temp = curr;
00351                   if( temp == gSoldierInitHead )
00352                   { //If we dealing with the head, we need to move it now.
00353                         gSoldierInitHead = gSoldierInitHead->next;
00354                         if( gfOriginalList )
00355                               gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00356                         else
00357                               gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00358                         gSoldierInitHead->prev = NULL;
00359                         temp->next = NULL;
00360                   }
00361                   curr = curr->prev;
00362                   //detach node from list
00363                   if( temp->prev )
00364                         temp->prev->next = temp->next;
00365                   if( temp->next )
00366                         temp->next->prev = temp->prev;
00367                   //add node to end of list
00368                   temp->prev = gSoldierInitTail;
00369                   temp->next = NULL;
00370                   gSoldierInitTail->next = temp;
00371                   gSoldierInitTail = temp;
00372             }
00373             else
00374             {
00375                   curr = curr->prev;
00376             }
00377       }
00378       //4th -- put to start
00379       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00380       while( curr )
00381       {
00382             if( !curr->pSoldier && !curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr != gSoldierInitHead )
00383             {     //Priority existance nodes without detailed placement info are moved to beginning of list
00384                   //copy node
00385                   temp = curr;
00386                   if( temp == gSoldierInitTail )
00387                   { //If we dealing with the tail, we need to move it now.
00388                         gSoldierInitTail = gSoldierInitTail->prev;
00389                         gSoldierInitTail->next = NULL;
00390                         temp->prev = NULL;
00391                   }
00392                   curr = curr->next;
00393                   //detach node from list
00394                   if( temp->prev )
00395                         temp->prev->next = temp->next;
00396                   if( temp->next )
00397                         temp->next->prev = temp->prev;
00398                   //add node to beginning of list
00399                   temp->prev = NULL;
00400                   temp->next = gSoldierInitHead;
00401                   gSoldierInitHead->prev = temp;
00402                   gSoldierInitHead = temp;
00403                   if( gfOriginalList )
00404                         gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00405                   else
00406                         gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00407             }
00408             else
00409             {     
00410                   curr = curr->next;
00411             }
00412       }
00413       //3rd priority sort (see below for reason why we do 2nd after 3rd)
00414       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00415       while( curr )
00416       {
00417             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && !curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr != gSoldierInitHead )
00418             {     //Priority existance nodes without detailed placement info are moved to beginning of list
00419                   //copy node
00420                   temp = curr;
00421                   if( temp == gSoldierInitTail )
00422                   { //If we dealing with the tail, we need to move it now.
00423                         gSoldierInitTail = gSoldierInitTail->prev;
00424                         gSoldierInitTail->next = NULL;
00425                         temp->prev = NULL;
00426                   }
00427                   curr = curr->next;
00428                   //detach node from list
00429                   if( temp->prev )
00430                         temp->prev->next = temp->next;
00431                   if( temp->next )
00432                         temp->next->prev = temp->prev;
00433                   //add node to beginning of list
00434                   temp->prev = NULL;
00435                   temp->next = gSoldierInitHead;
00436                   gSoldierInitHead->prev = temp;
00437                   gSoldierInitHead = temp;
00438                   if( gfOriginalList )
00439                         gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00440                   else
00441                         gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00442             }
00443             else
00444             {     
00445                   curr = curr->next;
00446             }
00447       }
00448       //2nd priority sort (by adding these to the front, it'll be before the 
00449       //3rd priority sort.  This is why we do it after.
00450       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00451       while( curr )
00452       {
00453             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr != gSoldierInitHead )
00454             {     //Priority existance nodes are moved to beginning of list
00455                   //copy node
00456                   temp = curr;
00457                   if( temp == gSoldierInitTail )
00458                   { //If we dealing with the tail, we need to move it now.
00459                         gSoldierInitTail = gSoldierInitTail->prev;
00460                         gSoldierInitTail->next = NULL;
00461                         temp->prev = NULL;
00462                   }
00463                   curr = curr->next;
00464                   //detach node from list
00465                   if( temp->prev )
00466                         temp->prev->next = temp->next;
00467                   if( temp->next )
00468                         temp->next->prev = temp->prev;
00469                   //add node to beginning of list
00470                   temp->prev = NULL;
00471                   temp->next = gSoldierInitHead;
00472                   gSoldierInitHead->prev = temp;
00473                   gSoldierInitHead = temp;
00474                   if( gfOriginalList )
00475                         gOriginalSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00476                   else
00477                         gAlternateSoldierInitListHead = gSoldierInitHead;
00478             }
00479             else
00480             {     
00481                   curr = curr->next;
00482             }
00483       }
00484       //4th priority sort
00485       //Done!  If the soldier existing slots are at the end of the list and the
00486       //                 priority placements are at the beginning of the list, then the
00487       //                 basic placements are in the middle.
00488 
00489       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00490       while( curr )
00491       {
00492             if ( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile == FREDO )
00493             {
00494                   fFredoAtEnd = TRUE;
00495                   break;
00496             }
00497             curr = curr->next;
00498       }
00499 
00500 }
00501 
00502 BOOLEAN AddPlacementToWorld( SOLDIERINITNODE *curr )
00503 {
00504       UINT8 ubProfile;
00505       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT tempDetailedPlacement;
00506       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00507       UINT8 ubID;
00508 
00509       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld"));
00510       // First check if this guy has a profile and if so check his location such that it matches!
00511       // Get profile from placement info
00512       memset( &tempDetailedPlacement, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
00513 
00514       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: decide on placement"));
00515       if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00516       {
00517             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: already have detailed placement"));
00518             ubProfile = curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile;
00519 
00520             if( ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && !gfEditMode )
00521             {
00522                   if( gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ||
00523                           gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY ||
00524                               gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ ||
00525                               gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & (PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED | PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_EPCACTIVE) ||
00526 //                      gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_DONT_ADD_TO_SECTOR ||
00527                               !gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].bLife   ||
00528                               gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo 
00529                          )
00530                   {
00531                         return FALSE;
00532                   }
00533             }
00534             //Special case code when adding icecream truck.
00535             if( !gfEditMode )
00536             {
00537                   // CJC, August 18, 1999: don't do this code unless the ice cream truck is on our team
00538                   if ( FindSoldierByProfileID( ICECREAMTRUCK, TRUE ) != NULL )
00539                   {
00540                         if( curr->pDetailedPlacement->bBodyType == ICECREAMTRUCK )
00541                         { //Check to see if Hamous is here and not recruited.  If so, add truck
00542                               if( gMercProfiles[ HAMOUS ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ||
00543                                           gMercProfiles[ HAMOUS ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY ||
00544                                           gMercProfiles[ HAMOUS ].bSectorZ )
00545                               { //not here, so don't add
00546                                     return TRUE;
00547                               }
00548                               //Hamous is here.  Check to make sure he isn't recruited.
00549                               if( gMercProfiles[ HAMOUS ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED )
00550                               {
00551                                     return TRUE;
00552                               }
00553                         }
00554                   }
00555             }
00556             CreateDetailedPlacementGivenStaticDetailedPlacementAndBasicPlacementInfo(
00557                   &tempDetailedPlacement, curr->pDetailedPlacement, curr->pBasicPlacement );          
00558       }
00559       else
00560       {
00561             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: create detailed placement"));
00562             CreateDetailedPlacementGivenBasicPlacementInfo( &tempDetailedPlacement, curr->pBasicPlacement );
00563       }
00564 
00565       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: if not edit mode"));
00566       if ( !gfEditMode )
00567       {
00568             if( tempDetailedPlacement.bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
00569             {
00570                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: set quest overrides"));
00571                   // quest-related overrides
00572                   if ( gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C )
00573                   {
00574                         UINT8 ubRoom;
00575 
00576                         // Kinpin guys might be guarding Tony
00577                         if ( tempDetailedPlacement.ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP && ( gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ] == CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE || ( (gubQuest[ QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY ] == QUESTINPROGRESS) && (CheckFact( FACT_KINGPIN_CAN_SEND_ASSASSINS, KINGPIN )) ) ) )
00578                         {
00579                               if (tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == NO_PROFILE) 
00580                               {
00581                                     // these guys should be guarding Tony!
00582                                     tempDetailedPlacement.sInsertionGridNo = 13531 +
00583                                           (INT16) ( PreRandom( 8 ) * ( PreRandom( 1 ) ? -1 : 1)
00584                                           + PreRandom( 8 ) * ( PreRandom( 1 ) ? -1 : 1) * WORLD_ROWS );
00585 
00586                                     switch( PreRandom( 3 ) )
00587                                     {
00588                                           case 0:
00589                                                 tempDetailedPlacement.bOrders = ONGUARD;
00590                                                 break;
00591                                           case 1:
00592                                                 tempDetailedPlacement.bOrders = CLOSEPATROL;
00593                                                 break;
00594                                           case 2:
00595                                                 tempDetailedPlacement.bOrders = ONCALL;
00596                                                 break;
00597 
00598                                     }
00599                               }
00600                               else if (tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == BILLY ) 
00601                               {
00602                                     // billy should now be able to roam around
00603                                     tempDetailedPlacement.sInsertionGridNo = 13531 +
00604                                           (INT16) ( PreRandom( 30 ) * ( PreRandom( 1 ) ? -1 : 1)
00605                                           + PreRandom( 30 ) * ( PreRandom( 1 ) ? -1 : 1) * WORLD_ROWS );
00606                                     tempDetailedPlacement.bOrders = SEEKENEMY;
00607                               }
00608                               else if ( tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == MADAME )
00609                               {
00610                                     // she shouldn't be here!
00611                                     return( TRUE );
00612                               }
00613                               else if ( tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == NO_PROFILE && InARoom( tempDetailedPlacement.sInsertionGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom ) )
00614                               {                             
00615                                     // must be a hooker, shouldn't be there
00616                                     return( TRUE );
00617                               }
00618                         }
00619                   }
00620                   else if ( !gfInMeanwhile && gWorldSectorX == 3 && gWorldSectorY == 16 && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00621                   { //Special civilian setup for queen's palace.
00622                         if( gubFact[ FACT_QUEEN_DEAD ] ) 
00623                         {
00624                               if( tempDetailedPlacement.ubCivilianGroup == QUEENS_CIV_GROUP )
00625                               { //The queen's civs aren't added if queen is dead
00626                                     return TRUE;
00627                               }
00628                         }
00629                         else
00630                         {
00631                               if( gfUseAlternateQueenPosition && tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == QUEEN )
00632                               {
00633                                     tempDetailedPlacement.sInsertionGridNo = 11448;
00634                               }
00635                               if( tempDetailedPlacement.ubCivilianGroup != QUEENS_CIV_GROUP )
00636                               { //The free civilians aren't added if queen is alive
00637                                     return TRUE;
00638                               }
00639                         }
00640                   }
00641                   else if ( gWorldSectorX == TIXA_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y  && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
00642                   {
00643                         // Tixa prison, once liberated, should not have any civs without profiles unless
00644                         // they are kids
00645                         if( !StrategicMap[ TIXA_SECTOR_X + TIXA_SECTOR_Y * MAP_WORLD_X ].fEnemyControlled && tempDetailedPlacement.ubProfile == NO_PROFILE && tempDetailedPlacement.bBodyType != HATKIDCIV && tempDetailedPlacement.bBodyType != KIDCIV )
00646                         {
00647                               // not there
00648                               return( TRUE );
00649                         }
00650                   }
00651                   else if ( gWorldSectorX == 13 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
00652                   {
00653                         if ( CheckFact( FACT_KIDS_ARE_FREE, 0 ) )
00654                         {
00655                               if ( tempDetailedPlacement.bBodyType == HATKIDCIV || tempDetailedPlacement.bBodyType == KIDCIV )
00656                               {
00657                                     // not there any more!  kids have been freeeeed!
00658                                     return( TRUE );
00659                               }
00660                         }
00661                   }
00662             }
00663             
00664             //SPECIAL!  Certain events in the game can cause profiled NPCs to become enemies.  The two cases are 
00665             //adding Mike and Iggy.  We will only add one NPC in any given combat and the conditions for setting
00666             //the associated facts are done elsewhere.  There is also another place where NPCs can get added, which
00667             //is in TacticalCreateElite() used for inserting offensive enemies.
00668             if( tempDetailedPlacement.bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && tempDetailedPlacement.ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE )
00669             {
00670                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: set npcs to enemies"));
00671                   OkayToUpgradeEliteToSpecialProfiledEnemy( &tempDetailedPlacement );
00672             }
00673       }
00674 
00675       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: create soldier"));
00676       pSoldier = TacticalCreateSoldier( &tempDetailedPlacement, &ubID );
00677       if( pSoldier )
00678       {
00679             curr->pSoldier = pSoldier;
00680             curr->ubSoldierID = ubID;
00681             AddSoldierToSectorNoCalculateDirection( ubID );
00682 
00683             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && !pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem )
00684             {
00685                   pSoldier = pSoldier;
00686             }
00687             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: return true"));
00688 
00689             return TRUE;
00690       }
00691       else
00692       {
00693             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("Failed to create soldier using TacticalCreateSoldier within AddPlacementToWorld"));
00694             LiveMessage( "Failed to create soldier using TacticalCreateSoldier within AddPlacementToWorld" );
00695       }
00696 
00697       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorld: return false"));
00698       return FALSE;
00699 }
00700 
00701 void AddPlacementToWorldByProfileID( UINT8 ubProfile )
00702 {
00703       SOLDIERINITNODE * curr;
00704       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddPlacementToWorldByProfileID"));
00705 
00706       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00707       while( curr )
00708       {
00709             if ( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile == ubProfile && !curr->pSoldier )
00710             {     
00711                   //Matching profile, so add this placement.
00712                   AddPlacementToWorld( curr );
00713                   break;
00714             }
00715             curr = curr->next;
00716       }
00717 }
00718 
00719 UINT8 AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld( INT8 bTeam, UINT8 ubMaxNum )
00720 {
00721       UINT8 ubNumAdded = 0;
00722       SOLDIERINITNODE *mark;
00723       UINT8 ubSlotsToFill;
00724       UINT8 ubSlotsAvailable;
00725       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00726       
00727       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld"));
00728       //Sort the list in the following manner:
00729       //-Priority placements first
00730       //-Basic placements next
00731       //-Any placements with existing soldiers last (overrides others)
00732       SortSoldierInitList();
00733 
00734       if( giCurrentTilesetID == 1 ) //cave/mine tileset only 
00735       { //convert all civilians to miners which use uniforms and more masculine body types.
00736             curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00737             while( curr )
00738             {
00739                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && !curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00740                   {
00741                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_MINER;
00742                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = -1;
00743                   }
00744                   curr = curr->next;
00745             }
00746       }
00747 
00748       //Count the current number of soldiers of the specified team
00749       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00750       while( curr )
00751       {
00752             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == bTeam && curr->pSoldier )
00753                   ubNumAdded++;  //already one here!
00754             curr = curr->next;
00755       }
00756 
00757       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00758 
00759       //First fill up all of the priority existance slots...
00760       while( curr && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum )
00761       {
00762             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == bTeam )
00763             {     
00764                   //Matching team, so add this placement.
00765                   if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
00766                   {
00767                         ubNumAdded++;
00768                   }
00769             }
00770             curr = curr->next;
00771       }
00772       if( ubNumAdded == ubMaxNum )
00773             return ubNumAdded;
00774 
00775       //Now count the number of nodes that are basic placements of desired team
00776       //This information will be used to randomly determine which of these placements
00777       //will be added based on the number of slots we can still add.
00778       mark = curr;
00779       ubSlotsAvailable = 0;
00780       ubSlotsToFill = ubMaxNum - ubNumAdded;
00781       while( curr && !curr->pSoldier && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum )
00782       {
00783             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == bTeam )
00784                   ubSlotsAvailable++;
00785             curr = curr->next;
00786       }
00787 
00788       //we now have the number, so compared it to the num we can add, and determine how we will
00789       //randomly determine which nodes to add.
00790       if( !ubSlotsAvailable )
00791       {     //There aren't any basic placements of desired team, so exit.
00792             return ubNumAdded;
00793       }
00794       curr = mark;
00795       //while we have a list, with no active soldiers, the num added is less than the max num requested, and
00796       //we have slots available, process the list to add new soldiers.
00797       while( curr && !curr->pSoldier && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum && ubSlotsAvailable )
00798       {
00799             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == bTeam )
00800             {
00801                   if( ubSlotsAvailable <= ubSlotsToFill || Random( ubSlotsAvailable ) < ubSlotsToFill )
00802                   {
00803                         //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
00804                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
00805                         {
00806                               ubNumAdded++;
00807                         }
00808                         else
00809                         {
00810                               //if it fails to create the soldier, it is likely that it is because the slots in the tactical 
00811                               //engine are already full.  Besides, the strategic AI shouldn't be trying to fill a map with
00812                               //more than the maximum allowable soldiers of team.  All teams can have a max of 32 individuals,
00813                               //except for the player which is 20.  Players aren't processed in this list anyway.
00814                               return ubNumAdded;
00815                         }
00816                         ubSlotsToFill--;
00817                   }
00818                   ubSlotsAvailable--;
00819                   //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
00820                   //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
00821             }
00822             curr = curr->next;
00823       }
00824       return ubNumAdded;
00825 }
00826 
00827 void AddSoldierInitListEnemyDefenceSoldiers( UINT8 ubTotalAdmin, UINT8 ubTotalTroops, UINT8 ubTotalElite )
00828 {
00829       SOLDIERINITNODE *mark;
00830       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00831       INT32 iRandom;
00832       UINT8 ubMaxNum;
00833       INT8 bTeam = ENEMY_TEAM;
00834       UINT8 ubElitePDSlots = 0, ubEliteDSlots = 0, ubElitePSlots = 0, ubEliteBSlots = 0;
00835       UINT8 ubTroopPDSlots = 0, ubTroopDSlots = 0, ubTroopPSlots = 0, ubTroopBSlots = 0;
00836       UINT8 ubAdminPDSlots = 0, ubAdminDSlots = 0, ubAdminPSlots = 0, ubAdminBSlots = 0;
00837       UINT8 ubFreeSlots;
00838       UINT8 *pCurrSlots=NULL;
00839       UINT8 *pCurrTotal=NULL;
00840       UINT8 ubCurrClass;
00841 
00842       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierInitListEnemyDefenceSoldiers"));
00843 
00844       ResetMortarsOnTeamCount();
00845 
00846       //Specs call for only one profiled enemy can be in a sector at a time due to flavor reasons.
00847       gfProfiledEnemyAdded = FALSE;
00848       
00849       //Because the enemy defence forces work differently than the regular map placements, the numbers
00850       //of each type of enemy may not be the same.  Elites will choose the best placements, then army, then
00851       //administrators.
00852 
00853       ubMaxNum = ubTotalAdmin + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalElite;
00854       
00855       //Sort the list in the following manner:
00856       //-Priority placements first
00857       //-Basic placements next
00858       //-Any placements with existing soldiers last (overrides others)
00859       SortSoldierInitList();
00860 
00861       //Now count the number of nodes that are basic placements of desired team AND CLASS
00862       //This information will be used to randomly determine which of these placements
00863       //will be added based on the number of slots we can still add.
00864       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00865       while( curr && !curr->pSoldier )
00866       {
00867             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00868             {
00869                   switch( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass )
00870                   {
00871                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00872                               if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00873                                     ubElitePDSlots++; 
00874                               else if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00875                                     ubElitePSlots++;
00876                               else if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00877                                     ubEliteDSlots++;
00878                               else
00879                                     ubEliteBSlots++;
00880                               break;
00881                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:         
00882                               if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00883                                     ubAdminPDSlots++; 
00884                               else if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00885                                     ubAdminPSlots++;
00886                               else if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00887                                     ubAdminDSlots++;
00888                               else
00889                                     ubAdminBSlots++;
00890                               break;
00891                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:                                    
00892                               if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00893                                     ubTroopPDSlots++; 
00894                               else if( curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00895                                     ubTroopPSlots++;
00896                               else if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
00897                                     ubTroopDSlots++;
00898                               else
00899                                     ubTroopBSlots++;
00900                               break;
00901                   }
00902             }
00903             curr = curr->next;
00904       }
00905 
00906       //ADD PLACEMENTS WITH PRIORITY EXISTANCE WITH DETAILED PLACEMENT INFORMATION FIRST
00907       //we now have the numbers of available slots for each soldier class, so loop through three times
00908       //and randomly choose some (or all) of the matching slots to fill.  This is done randomly.
00909       for( ubCurrClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR; ubCurrClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY; ubCurrClass++ )
00910       {
00911             //First, prepare the counters.
00912             switch( ubCurrClass )
00913             {
00914                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
00915                         pCurrSlots = &ubAdminPDSlots;
00916                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalAdmin;
00917                         break;
00918                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00919                         pCurrSlots = &ubElitePDSlots;
00920                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalElite;
00921                         break;
00922                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
00923                         pCurrSlots = &ubTroopPDSlots;
00924                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalTroops;
00925                         break;
00926             }
00927             //Now, loop through the priority existance and detailed placement section of the list.
00928             curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
00929             while( curr && ubMaxNum && *pCurrTotal && *pCurrSlots &&
00930                    curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00931             {
00932                   if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00933                   {
00934                         if( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == ubCurrClass )
00935                         {
00936                               if( *pCurrSlots <= *pCurrTotal || Random( *pCurrSlots ) < *pCurrTotal )
00937                               {
00938                                     //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
00939                                     if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
00940                                     {
00941                                           (*pCurrTotal)--;
00942                                           ubMaxNum--;
00943                                     }
00944                                     else
00945                                           return;
00946                               }
00947                               (*pCurrSlots)--;
00948                               //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
00949                               //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
00950                         }
00951                   }
00952                   curr = curr->next;
00953             }
00954       }
00955       if( !ubMaxNum )
00956             return;
00957       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00958       while( curr && curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00959             curr = curr->next;
00960       mark = curr;
00961 
00962       //ADD PLACEMENTS WITH PRIORITY EXISTANCE AND NO DETAILED PLACEMENT INFORMATION SECOND
00963       //we now have the numbers of available slots for each soldier class, so loop through three times
00964       //and randomly choose some (or all) of the matching slots to fill.  This is done randomly.
00965       for( ubCurrClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR; ubCurrClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY; ubCurrClass++ )
00966       {
00967             //First, prepare the counters.
00968             switch( ubCurrClass )
00969             {
00970                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
00971                         pCurrSlots = &ubAdminPSlots;
00972                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalAdmin;
00973                         break;
00974                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
00975                         pCurrSlots = &ubElitePSlots;
00976                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalElite;
00977                         break;
00978                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
00979                         pCurrSlots = &ubTroopPSlots;
00980                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalTroops;
00981                         break;
00982             }
00983             //Now, loop through the priority existance and non detailed placement section of the list.
00984             curr = mark;
00985             while( curr && ubMaxNum && *pCurrTotal && *pCurrSlots &&
00986                    !curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
00987             {
00988                   if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00989                   {
00990                         if( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == ubCurrClass )
00991                         {
00992                               if( *pCurrSlots <= *pCurrTotal || Random( *pCurrSlots ) < *pCurrTotal )
00993                               {
00994                                     //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
00995                                     if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
00996                                     {
00997                                           (*pCurrTotal)--;
00998                                           ubMaxNum--;
00999                                     }
01000                                     else
01001                                           return;
01002                               }
01003                               (*pCurrSlots)--;
01004                               //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01005                               //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01006                         }
01007                   }
01008                   curr = curr->next;
01009             }
01010       }
01011       if( !ubMaxNum )
01012             return;
01013       curr = mark;
01014       while( curr && !curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
01015             curr = curr->next;
01016       mark = curr;
01017       
01018       //ADD PLACEMENTS WITH NO DETAILED PLACEMENT AND PRIORITY EXISTANCE INFORMATION SECOND
01019       //we now have the numbers of available slots for each soldier class, so loop through three times
01020       //and randomly choose some (or all) of the matching slots to fill.  This is done randomly.
01021       for( ubCurrClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR; ubCurrClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY; ubCurrClass++ )
01022       {
01023             //First, prepare the counters.
01024             switch( ubCurrClass )
01025             {
01026                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
01027                         pCurrSlots = &ubAdminDSlots;
01028                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalAdmin;
01029                         break;
01030                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
01031                         pCurrSlots = &ubEliteDSlots;
01032                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalElite;
01033                         break;
01034                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
01035                         pCurrSlots = &ubTroopDSlots;
01036                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalTroops;
01037                         break;
01038             }
01039             //Now, loop through the priority existance and detailed placement section of the list.
01040             curr = mark;
01041             while( curr && ubMaxNum && *pCurrTotal && *pCurrSlots &&
01042                    curr->pDetailedPlacement && !curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
01043             {
01044                   if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01045                   {
01046                         if( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == ubCurrClass )
01047                         {
01048                               if( *pCurrSlots <= *pCurrTotal || Random( *pCurrSlots ) < *pCurrTotal )
01049                               {
01050                                     //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
01051                                     if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01052                                     {
01053                                           (*pCurrTotal)--;
01054                                           ubMaxNum--;
01055                                     }
01056                                     else
01057                                           return;
01058                               }
01059                               (*pCurrSlots)--;
01060                               //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01061                               //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01062                         }
01063                   }
01064                   curr = curr->next;
01065             }
01066       }
01067       if( !ubMaxNum )
01068             return;
01069       curr = mark;
01070       while( curr && curr->pDetailedPlacement && !curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
01071             curr = curr->next;
01072       mark = curr;
01073 
01074       //Kris: January 11, 2000 -- NEW!!!
01075       //PRIORITY EXISTANT SLOTS MUST BE FILLED
01076       //This must be done to ensure all priority existant slots are filled before ANY other slots are filled,
01077       //even if that means changing the class of the slot.  Also, assume that there are no matching fits left 
01078       //for priority existance slots.  All of the matches have been already assigned in the above passes.  
01079       //We'll have to convert the soldier type of the slot to match.
01080       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01081       while( curr && ubMaxNum && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance )
01082       {
01083             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01084             {
01085                   //Choose which team to use.
01086                   iRandom = Random( ubMaxNum );
01087                   if( iRandom < ubTotalElite )
01088                   {
01089                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE;
01090                         ubTotalElite--;
01091                   }
01092                   else if( iRandom < ubTotalElite + ubTotalTroops )
01093                   {
01094                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY;
01095                         ubTotalTroops--;
01096                   }
01097                   else if( iRandom < ubTotalElite + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalAdmin )
01098                   {
01099                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR;
01100                         ubTotalAdmin--;
01101                   }
01102                   else
01103                         Assert(0);
01104                   if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01105                   {
01106                         ubMaxNum--;
01107                   }
01108                   else
01109                         return;
01110             }
01111             curr = curr->next;
01112       }
01113       if( !ubMaxNum )
01114             return;
01115       
01116       //ADD REMAINING PLACEMENTS WITH BASIC PLACEMENT INFORMATION
01117       //we now have the numbers of available slots for each soldier class, so loop through three times
01118       //and randomly choose some (or all) of the matching slots to fill.  This is done randomly.
01119       for( ubCurrClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR; ubCurrClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY; ubCurrClass++ )
01120       {
01121             //First, prepare the counters.
01122             switch( ubCurrClass )
01123             {
01124                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
01125                         pCurrSlots = &ubAdminBSlots;
01126                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalAdmin;
01127                         break;
01128                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
01129                         pCurrSlots = &ubEliteBSlots;
01130                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalElite;
01131                         break;
01132                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
01133                         pCurrSlots = &ubTroopBSlots;
01134                         pCurrTotal = &ubTotalTroops;
01135                         break;
01136             }
01137             //Now, loop through the regular basic placements section of the list.
01138             curr = mark;
01139             while( curr && ubMaxNum && *pCurrTotal && *pCurrSlots )
01140             {
01141                   if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01142                   {
01143                         if( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == ubCurrClass )
01144                         {
01145                               if( *pCurrSlots <= *pCurrTotal || Random( *pCurrSlots ) < *pCurrTotal )
01146                               {
01147                                     //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
01148                                     if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01149                                     {
01150                                           (*pCurrTotal)--;
01151                                           ubMaxNum--;
01152                                     }
01153                                     else
01154                                           return;
01155                               }
01156                               (*pCurrSlots)--;
01157                               //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01158                               //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01159                         }
01160                   }
01161                   curr = curr->next;
01162             }
01163       }
01164       if( !ubMaxNum )
01165             return;
01166 
01167       //If we are at this point, that means that there are some compatibility issues.  This is fine.  An example 
01168       //would be a map containing 1 elite placement, and 31 troop placements.  If we had 3 elites move into this
01169       //sector, we would not have placements for two of them.  What we have to do is override the class information
01170       //contained in the list by choosing unused placements, and assign them to the elites.  This time, we will 
01171       //use all free slots including priority placement slots (ignoring the priority placement information).  
01172 
01173       //First, count up the total number of free slots.
01174       ubFreeSlots = 0;
01175       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01176       while( curr )
01177       {
01178             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01179                   ubFreeSlots++;
01180             curr = curr->next;
01181       }
01182 
01183       //Now, loop through the entire list again, but for the last time.  All enemies will be inserted now ignoring
01184       //detailed placements and classes.
01185       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01186       while( curr && ubFreeSlots && ubMaxNum )
01187       {
01188             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01189             {
01190                   //Randomly determine if we will use this slot; the more available slots in proportion to
01191                   //the number of enemies, the lower the chance of accepting the slot.
01192                   if( ubFreeSlots <= ubMaxNum || Random( ubFreeSlots ) < ubMaxNum )
01193                   {
01194                         //Choose which team to use.
01195                         iRandom = Random( ubMaxNum );
01196                         if( iRandom < ubTotalElite )
01197                         {
01198                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE;
01199                               ubTotalElite--;
01200                         }
01201                         else if( iRandom < ubTotalElite + ubTotalTroops )
01202                         {
01203                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY;
01204                               ubTotalTroops--;
01205                         }
01206                         else if( iRandom < ubTotalElite + ubTotalTroops + ubTotalAdmin )
01207                         {
01208                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR;
01209                               ubTotalAdmin--;
01210                         }
01211                         else
01212                               Assert(0);
01213                         /* DISABLE THE OVERRIDE FOR NOW...
01214                         if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01215                         { //delete the detailed placement information.
01216                               MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01217                               curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01218                               curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement = FALSE;
01219                         }
01220                         */
01221                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01222                         {
01223                               ubMaxNum--;
01224                         }
01225                         else
01226                               return;
01227                   }
01228                   ubFreeSlots--;
01229                   //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01230                   //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01231             }
01232             curr = curr->next;
01233       }
01234 }
01235 
01236 //If we are adding militia to our map, then we do a few things differently.
01237 //First of all, they exist exclusively to the enemy troops, so if the militia exists in the
01238 //sector, then they get to use the enemy placements.  However, we remove any orders from
01239 //placements containing RNDPTPATROL or POINTPATROL orders, as well as remove any detailed
01240 //placement information.
01241 void AddSoldierInitListMilitia( UINT8 ubNumGreen, UINT8 ubNumRegs, UINT8 ubNumElites )
01242 {
01243       SOLDIERINITNODE *mark;
01244       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01245       INT32 iRandom;
01246       UINT8 ubMaxNum;
01247       BOOLEAN fDoPlacement;
01248       INT8 bTeam = ENEMY_TEAM;
01249       UINT8 ubEliteSlots = 0;
01250       UINT8 ubRegSlots = 0;
01251       UINT8 ubGreenSlots = 0;
01252       UINT8 ubFreeSlots;
01253       UINT8 *pCurrSlots=NULL;
01254       UINT8 *pCurrTotal=NULL;
01255       UINT8 ubCurrClass;
01256 
01257       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierInitListMilitia"));
01258 
01259       ubMaxNum = ubNumGreen + ubNumRegs + ubNumElites;
01260       
01261       //Sort the list in the following manner:
01262       //-Priority placements first
01263       //-Basic placements next
01264       //-Any placements with existing soldiers last (overrides others)
01265       SortSoldierInitList();
01266 
01267       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01268 
01269       //First fill up only the priority existance slots (as long as the availability and class are okay)
01270       while( curr && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && ubMaxNum )
01271       {
01272             fDoPlacement = TRUE;
01273 
01274             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM || curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01275             {
01276                   //Matching team (kindof), now check the soldier class...
01277                   if( ubNumElites && curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE )
01278                   {
01279                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA;
01280                         ubNumElites--;
01281                   }
01282                   else if( ubNumRegs && curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY )
01283                   {
01284                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA;
01285                         ubNumRegs--;
01286                   }
01287                   else if( ubNumGreen && curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR )
01288                   {
01289                         curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA;
01290                         ubNumGreen--;
01291                   }
01292                   else
01293                         fDoPlacement = FALSE;
01294 
01295                   if ( fDoPlacement )
01296                   {
01297                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam = MILITIA_TEAM;
01298                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bOrders = STATIONARY;
01299                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bAttitude = (INT8) Random( MAXATTITUDES );
01300                         if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01301                         { //delete the detailed placement information.
01302                               MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01303                               curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01304                               curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement = FALSE;
01305                               RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeAttributeLevel ), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
01306                               RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeEquipmentLevel ), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
01307                         }
01308                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01309                         {
01310                               ubMaxNum--;
01311                         }
01312                         else
01313                               return;
01314                   }
01315             }
01316             curr = curr->next;
01317       }
01318       if( !ubMaxNum )
01319             return;
01320       //Now count the number of nodes that are basic placements of desired team AND CLASS
01321       //This information will be used to randomly determine which of these placements
01322       //will be added based on the number of slots we can still add.
01323       mark = curr;
01324       while( curr && !curr->pSoldier )
01325       {
01326             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM || curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01327             {
01328                   switch( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass )
01329                   {
01330                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:                                   ubEliteSlots++;   break;
01331                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:         ubGreenSlots++; break;
01332                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:                                    ubRegSlots++; break;
01333                   }
01334             }
01335             curr = curr->next;
01336       }
01337 
01338       //we now have the numbers of available slots for each soldier class, so loop through three times
01339       //and randomly choose some (or all) of the matching slots to fill.  This is done randomly.
01340       for( ubCurrClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR; ubCurrClass <= SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY; ubCurrClass++ )
01341       {
01342             //First, prepare the counters.
01343             switch( ubCurrClass )
01344             {
01345                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
01346                         pCurrSlots = &ubGreenSlots;
01347                         pCurrTotal = &ubNumGreen;
01348                         break;
01349                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
01350                         pCurrSlots = &ubEliteSlots;
01351                         pCurrTotal = &ubNumElites;
01352                         break;
01353                   case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
01354                         pCurrSlots = &ubRegSlots;
01355                         pCurrTotal = &ubNumRegs;
01356                         break;
01357             }
01358             //Now, loop through the basic placement of the list.
01359             curr = mark; //mark is the marker where the basic placements start.
01360             while( curr && !curr->pSoldier && ubMaxNum && *pCurrTotal && *pCurrSlots )
01361             {
01362                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM || curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01363                   {
01364                         if( curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass == ubCurrClass )
01365                         {
01366                               if( *pCurrSlots <= *pCurrTotal || Random( *pCurrSlots ) < *pCurrTotal )
01367                               {
01368                                     curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam = MILITIA_TEAM;
01369                                     curr->pBasicPlacement->bOrders = STATIONARY;
01370                                     switch( ubCurrClass )
01371                                     {
01372                                           case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   
01373                                                 curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA;
01374                                                 break;
01375                                           case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
01376                                                 curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA;
01377                                                 break;
01378                                           case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
01379                                                 curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA;
01380                                                 break;
01381                                     }
01382                                     //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
01383                                     if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01384                                     {
01385                                           (*pCurrTotal)--;
01386                                           ubMaxNum--;
01387                                     }
01388                                     else
01389                                           return;
01390                               }
01391                               (*pCurrSlots)--;
01392                               //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01393                               //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01394                         }
01395                   }
01396                   curr = curr->next;
01397             }
01398       }
01399       if( !ubMaxNum )
01400             return;
01401       //If we are at this point, that means that there are some compatibility issues.  This is fine.  An example 
01402       //would be a map containing 1 elite placement, and 31 troop placements.  If we had 3 elites move into this
01403       //sector, we would not have placements for two of them.  What we have to do is override the class information
01404       //contained in the list by choosing unused placements, and assign them to the elites.  This time, we will 
01405       //use all free slots including priority placement slots (ignoring the priority placement information).  
01406 
01407       //First, count up the total number of free slots.
01408       ubFreeSlots = 0;
01409       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01410       while( curr )
01411       {
01412             if( !curr->pSoldier && (curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM || curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) )
01413                   ubFreeSlots++;
01414             curr = curr->next;
01415       }
01416 
01417       //Now, loop through the entire list again, but for the last time.  All enemies will be inserted now ignoring
01418       //detailed placements and classes.
01419       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01420       while( curr && ubFreeSlots && ubMaxNum )
01421       {
01422             if( !curr->pSoldier && (curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM || curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) )
01423             {
01424                   //Randomly determine if we will use this slot; the more available slots in proportion to
01425                   //the number of enemies, the lower the chance of accepting the slot.
01426                   if( ubFreeSlots <= ubMaxNum || Random( ubFreeSlots ) < ubMaxNum )
01427                   {
01428                         //Choose which team to use.
01429                         iRandom = Random( ubMaxNum );
01430                         if( iRandom < ubNumElites )
01431                         {
01432                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA;
01433                               ubNumElites--;
01434                         }
01435                         else if( iRandom < ubNumElites + ubNumRegs )
01436                         {
01437                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA;
01438                               ubNumRegs--;
01439                         }
01440                         else if( iRandom < ubNumElites + ubNumRegs + ubNumGreen )
01441                         {
01442                               curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass = SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA;
01443                               ubNumGreen--;
01444                         }
01445                         else
01446                               Assert(0);
01447                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam = MILITIA_TEAM;
01448                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bOrders = STATIONARY;
01449                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bAttitude = (INT8) Random( MAXATTITUDES );
01450                         if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01451                         { //delete the detailed placement information.
01452                               MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01453                               curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01454                               curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement = FALSE;
01455                               RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeAttributeLevel), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
01456                               RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeEquipmentLevel), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
01457                         }
01458                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01459                         {
01460                               ubMaxNum--;
01461                         }
01462                         else
01463                               return;
01464                   }
01465                   ubFreeSlots--;
01466                   //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01467                   //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01468             }
01469             curr = curr->next;
01470       }
01471 }
01472 
01473 void AddSoldierInitListCreatures( BOOLEAN fQueen, UINT8 ubNumLarvae, UINT8 ubNumInfants,  
01474                                                                                                       UINT8 ubNumYoungMales, UINT8 ubNumYoungFemales, UINT8 ubNumAdultMales, 
01475                                                                                                       UINT8 ubNumAdultFemales )
01476 {
01477       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01478       INT32 iRandom;
01479       UINT8 ubFreeSlots;
01480       BOOLEAN fDoPlacement;
01481       UINT8 ubNumCreatures;
01482       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierInitListCreatures"));
01483 
01484       SortSoldierInitList();
01485 
01486       //Okay, if we have a queen, place her first.  She MUST have a special placement, else
01487       //we can't use anything.
01488       ubNumCreatures = (UINT8)(ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants + ubNumYoungMales + ubNumYoungFemales + ubNumAdultMales + ubNumAdultFemales);
01489       if( fQueen )
01490       {
01491             curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01492             while( curr  )
01493             {
01494                   if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
01495                   {
01496                         if( !AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01497                         {
01498                               fQueen = FALSE;
01499                               break;
01500                         }
01501                   }
01502                   curr = curr->next;
01503             }
01504             if( !fQueen )
01505             {
01506                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01507                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Couldn't place the queen." );
01508                   #endif
01509             }
01510       }
01511 
01512       //First fill up only the priority existance slots (as long as the availability and bodytypes match)
01513       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01514       while( curr && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && ubNumCreatures )
01515       {
01516             fDoPlacement = TRUE;
01517 
01518             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
01519             {
01520                   //Matching team, now check the soldier class...
01521                   if( ubNumLarvae && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER )
01522                         ubNumLarvae--;
01523                   else if( ubNumInfants && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == INFANT_MONSTER )
01524                         ubNumInfants--;
01525                   else if( ubNumYoungMales && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == YAM_MONSTER )
01526                         ubNumYoungMales--;
01527                   else if( ubNumYoungFemales && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == YAF_MONSTER )
01528                         ubNumYoungFemales--;
01529                   else if( ubNumAdultMales && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == AM_MONSTER )
01530                         ubNumAdultMales--;
01531                   else if( ubNumAdultFemales && curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == ADULTFEMALEMONSTER )
01532                         ubNumAdultFemales--;
01533                   else
01534                         fDoPlacement = FALSE;
01535                   if ( fDoPlacement )
01536                   {
01537                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01538                         {
01539                               ubNumCreatures--;
01540                         }
01541                         else
01542                               return;
01543                   }
01544             }
01545             curr = curr->next;
01546       }
01547       if( !ubNumCreatures )
01548             return;
01549 
01550       //Count how many free creature slots are left.
01551       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01552       ubFreeSlots = 0;
01553       while( curr )
01554       {
01555             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
01556                   ubFreeSlots++;
01557             curr = curr->next;
01558       }
01559       //Now, if we still have creatures to place, do so completely randomly, overriding priority 
01560       //placements, etc.
01561       curr = gSoldierInitHead; 
01562       while( curr && ubFreeSlots && ubNumCreatures )
01563       {
01564             if( !curr->pSoldier && curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
01565             {
01566                   //Randomly determine if we will use this slot; the more available slots in proportion to
01567                   //the number of enemies, the lower the chance of accepting the slot.
01568                   if( ubFreeSlots <= ubNumCreatures || Random( ubFreeSlots ) < ubNumCreatures )
01569                   {
01570                         //Choose which team to use.
01571                         iRandom = Random( ubNumCreatures );
01572                         
01573                         if( ubNumLarvae && iRandom < ubNumLarvae )
01574                         {
01575                               ubNumLarvae--;
01576                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = LARVAE_MONSTER;
01577                         }
01578                         else if( ubNumInfants && iRandom < ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants )
01579                         {
01580                               ubNumInfants--;
01581                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = INFANT_MONSTER;
01582                         }
01583                         else if( ubNumYoungMales && iRandom < ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants + ubNumYoungMales )
01584                         {
01585                               ubNumYoungMales--;
01586                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = YAM_MONSTER;
