01587                         }
01588                         else if( ubNumYoungFemales && iRandom < ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants + ubNumYoungMales + ubNumYoungFemales )
01589                         {
01590                               ubNumYoungFemales--;
01591                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = YAF_MONSTER;
01592                         }
01593                         else if( ubNumAdultMales && iRandom < ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants + ubNumYoungMales + ubNumYoungFemales + ubNumAdultMales )
01594                         {
01595                               ubNumAdultMales--;
01596                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = AM_MONSTER;
01597                         }
01598                         else if( ubNumAdultFemales && iRandom < ubNumLarvae + ubNumInfants + ubNumYoungMales + ubNumYoungFemales + ubNumAdultMales + ubNumAdultFemales )
01599                         {
01600                               ubNumAdultFemales--;
01601                               curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = ADULTFEMALEMONSTER;
01602                         }
01603                         else
01604                               Assert(0);
01605                         if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01606                         { //delete the detailed placement information.
01607                               MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01608                               curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01609                               curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement = FALSE;
01610                         }
01611                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01612                         {
01613                               ubNumCreatures--;
01614                         }
01615                         else
01616                         {
01617                               return;
01618                         }
01619                   }
01620                   ubFreeSlots--;
01621                   //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01622                   //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01623             }
01624             curr = curr->next;
01625       }
01626 }
01627 
01628 
01629 
01630 SOLDIERINITNODE* FindSoldierInitNodeWithProfileID( UINT16 usProfile );
01631 SOLDIERINITNODE* FindSoldierInitNodeWithProfileID( UINT16 usProfile )
01632 {
01633       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01634       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01635       while( curr )
01636       {
01637             if( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile == usProfile )
01638                   return curr;
01639             curr = curr->next;
01640       }
01641       return NULL;
01642 }
01643 
01644 
01645 SOLDIERINITNODE* FindSoldierInitNodeWithID( UINT16 usID )
01646 {
01647       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01648       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01649       while( curr )
01650       {
01651             if( curr->pSoldier->ubID == usID )
01652                   return curr;
01653             curr = curr->next;
01654       }
01655       return NULL;
01656 }
01657 
01658 void UseEditorOriginalList()
01659 {
01660       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01661       gfOriginalList = TRUE;
01662       gSoldierInitHead = gOriginalSoldierInitListHead;
01663       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01664       if( curr )
01665       {
01666             while( curr->next )
01667                   curr = curr->next;
01668       }
01669       if( curr )
01670             gSoldierInitTail = curr;
01671 }
01672 
01673 void UseEditorAlternateList()
01674 {
01675       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01676       gfOriginalList = FALSE;
01677       gSoldierInitHead = gAlternateSoldierInitListHead;
01678       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01679       if( curr )
01680       {
01681             while( curr->next )
01682                   curr = curr->next;
01683       }
01684       if( curr )
01685             gSoldierInitTail = curr;
01686 }
01687 
01688 //Any killed people that used detailed placement information must prevent that from occurring
01689 //again in the future.  Otherwise, the sniper guy with 99 marksmanship could appear again
01690 //if the map was loaded again!
01691 void EvaluateDeathEffectsToSoldierInitList( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01692 {
01693       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01694       UINT8 ubNodeID;
01695       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01696       ubNodeID = 0;
01697       if( pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01698             return;
01699       while( curr )
01700       {
01701             if( curr->pSoldier == pSoldier )
01702             { //Matching soldier found
01703                   if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01704                   { //This soldier used detailed placement information, so we must save the
01705                         //node ID into the temp file which signifies that the 
01706 
01707                         //RECORD UBNODEID IN TEMP FILE.
01708 
01709                         curr->pSoldier = NULL;
01710                         MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01711                         curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01712                         return;
01713                   }
01714             }
01715             ubNodeID++;
01716             curr = curr->next;
01717       }
01718 }
01719 
01720 void RemoveDetailedPlacementInfo( UINT8 ubNodeID )
01721 {
01722       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01723       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01724       while( curr )
01725       {
01726             if( curr->ubNodeID == ubNodeID )
01727             {
01728                   if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
01729                   {
01730                         MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
01731                         curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
01732                         return;
01733                   }
01734             }
01735             curr = curr->next;
01736       }
01737 }
01738 
01739 //For the purpose of keeping track of which soldier belongs to which placement within the game,
01740 //the only way we can do this properly is to save the soldier ID from the list and reconnect the
01741 //soldier pointer whenever we load the game.
01742 BOOLEAN SaveSoldierInitListLinks( HWFILE hfile )
01743 {
01744       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01745       UINT32 uiNumBytesWritten;
01746       UINT8 ubSlots = 0;
01747 
01748       //count the number of soldier init nodes...
01749       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01750       while( curr )
01751       {
01752             ubSlots++;
01753             curr = curr->next;
01754       }
01755       //...and save it.
01756       FileWrite( hfile, &ubSlots, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01757       if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
01758       {
01759             return FALSE;
01760       }
01761       //Now, go through each node, and save just the ubSoldierID, if that soldier is alive.
01762       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01763       while( curr )
01764       {
01765             if( curr->pSoldier && !curr->pSoldier->bActive )
01766             {
01767                   curr->ubSoldierID = 0;
01768             }
01769             FileWrite( hfile, &curr->ubNodeID, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01770             if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
01771             {
01772                   return FALSE;
01773             }
01774             FileWrite( hfile, &curr->ubSoldierID, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01775             if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
01776             {
01777                   return FALSE;
01778             }
01779             curr = curr->next;
01780       }
01781       return TRUE;
01782 }
01783 
01784 BOOLEAN LoadSoldierInitListLinks( HWFILE hfile )
01785 {
01786       UINT32 uiNumBytesRead;
01787       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01788       UINT8 ubSlots, ubSoldierID, ubNodeID;
01789       
01790       FileRead( hfile, &ubSlots, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
01791       if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
01792       {
01793             return FALSE;
01794       }
01795       while( ubSlots-- )
01796       {
01797             FileRead( hfile, &ubNodeID, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
01798             if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
01799             {
01800                   return FALSE;
01801             }
01802             FileRead( hfile, &ubSoldierID, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
01803             if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
01804             {
01805                   return FALSE;
01806             }
01807 
01808             if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
01809             {
01810                   curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01811                   while( curr )
01812                   {
01813                         if( curr->ubNodeID == ubNodeID )
01814                         {
01815                               curr->ubSoldierID = ubSoldierID;
01816                               if( ubSoldierID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID && 
01817                                           ubSoldierID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID ||
01818                                           ubSoldierID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID && 
01819                                           ubSoldierID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID )
01820                               { //only enemies and creatures.
01821                                     curr->pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
01822                               }
01823                         }
01824                         curr = curr->next;
01825                   }
01826             }
01827       }
01828       return TRUE;
01829 }
01830 
01831 void AddSoldierInitListBloodcats()
01832 {
01833       SECTORINFO *pSector;
01834       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01835       UINT8 ubSectorID;
01836       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierInitListBloodcats"));
01837 
01838       if( gbWorldSectorZ )
01839       {
01840             return; //no bloodcats underground.
01841       }
01842 
01843       ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01844       pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
01845 
01846       if( !pSector->bBloodCatPlacements )
01847       { //This map has no bloodcat placements, so don't waste CPU time.
01848             return;
01849       }
01850       
01851       if( pSector->bBloodCatPlacements )
01852       { //We don't yet know the number of bloodcat placements in this sector so
01853             //count them now, and permanently record it.
01854             INT8 bBloodCatPlacements = 0;
01855             curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01856             while( curr )
01857             {
01858                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01859                   {
01860                         bBloodCatPlacements++;
01861                   }
01862                   curr = curr->next;
01863             }
01864             if( bBloodCatPlacements != pSector->bBloodCatPlacements &&
01865                         ubSectorID != SEC_I16 && ubSectorID != SEC_N5 )
01866             {
01867                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01868                         UINT16 str[200];
01869                         swprintf( str, L"Table specifies that there are %d bloodcat placements in sector %c%d, but the map actually has %d bloodcat placements. Map value takes precedence. KM,LC:1",
01870                                                       pSector->bBloodCatPlacements, gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, bBloodCatPlacements );
01871                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01872                   #endif
01873                   pSector->bBloodCatPlacements = bBloodCatPlacements;
01874                   pSector->bBloodCats = -1;
01875                   if( !bBloodCatPlacements )
01876                   {
01877                         return;
01878                   }
01879             }
01880       }
01881       if( pSector->bBloodCats > 0 )
01882       { //Add them to the world now...
01883             UINT8 ubNumAdded = 0;
01884             UINT8 ubMaxNum = (UINT8)pSector->bBloodCats;
01885             SOLDIERINITNODE *mark;
01886             UINT8 ubSlotsToFill;
01887             UINT8 ubSlotsAvailable;
01888             SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
01889             
01890             //Sort the list in the following manner:
01891             //-Priority placements first
01892             //-Basic placements next
01893             //-Any placements with existing soldiers last (overrides others)
01894             SortSoldierInitList();
01895 
01896             //Count the current number of soldiers of the specified team
01897             curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01898             while( curr )
01899             {
01900                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == BLOODCAT && curr->pSoldier )
01901                         ubNumAdded++;  //already one here!
01902                   curr = curr->next;
01903             }
01904 
01905             curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01906 
01907             //First fill up all of the priority existance slots...
01908             while( curr && curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum )
01909             {
01910                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01911                   {     
01912                         //Matching team, so add this placement.
01913                         if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01914                         {
01915                               ubNumAdded++;
01916                         }
01917                   }
01918                   curr = curr->next;
01919             }
01920             if( ubNumAdded == ubMaxNum )
01921                   return;
01922 
01923             //Now count the number of nodes that are basic placements of desired team
01924             //This information will be used to randomly determine which of these placements
01925             //will be added based on the number of slots we can still add.
01926             mark = curr;
01927             ubSlotsAvailable = 0;
01928             ubSlotsToFill = ubMaxNum - ubNumAdded;
01929             while( curr && !curr->pSoldier && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum )
01930             {
01931                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01932                         ubSlotsAvailable++;
01933                   curr = curr->next;
01934             }
01935 
01936             //we now have the number, so compared it to the num we can add, and determine how we will
01937             //randomly determine which nodes to add.
01938             if( !ubSlotsAvailable )
01939             {     //There aren't any basic placements of desired team, so exit.
01940                   return;
01941             }
01942             curr = mark;
01943             //while we have a list, with no active soldiers, the num added is less than the max num requested, and
01944             //we have slots available, process the list to add new soldiers.
01945             while( curr && !curr->pSoldier && ubNumAdded < ubMaxNum && ubSlotsAvailable )
01946             {
01947                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01948                   {
01949                         if( ubSlotsAvailable <= ubSlotsToFill || Random( ubSlotsAvailable ) < ubSlotsToFill )
01950                         {
01951                               //found matching team, so add this soldier to the game.
01952                               if( AddPlacementToWorld( curr ) )
01953                               {
01954                                     ubNumAdded++;
01955                               }
01956                               else
01957                               {
01958                                     //if it fails to create the soldier, it is likely that it is because the slots in the tactical 
01959                                     //engine are already full.  Besides, the strategic AI shouldn't be trying to fill a map with
01960                                     //more than the maximum allowable soldiers of team.  All teams can have a max of 32 individuals,
01961                                     //except for the player which is 20.  Players aren't processed in this list anyway.
01962                                     return;
01963                               }
01964                               ubSlotsToFill--;
01965                         }
01966                         ubSlotsAvailable--;
01967                         //With the decrementing of the slot vars in this manner, the chances increase so that all slots
01968                         //will be full by the time the end of the list comes up.
01969                   }
01970                   curr = curr->next;
01971             }
01972             return;
01973       }
01974 }
01975 
01976 
01977 SOLDIERINITNODE * FindSoldierInitListNodeByProfile( UINT8 ubProfile )
01978 {
01979       SOLDIERINITNODE * curr;
01980 
01981       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01982 
01983       while( curr )
01984       {
01985             if ( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile == ubProfile )
01986             {
01987                   return( curr );
01988             }
01989             curr = curr->next;
01990       }
01991       return( NULL );
01992 }
01993 
01994 //This is the code that loops through the profiles starting at the RPCs, and adds them using strategic insertion
01995 //information, and not editor placements.  The key flag involved for doing it this way is the gMercProfiles[i].fUseProfileInsertionInfo.
01996 void AddProfilesUsingProfileInsertionData()
01997 {
01998       INT32 i;
01999       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02000       SOLDIERINITNODE * curr;
02001 
02002       for( i = FIRST_RPC; i < ( PROF_HUMMER ); i++ )
02003       {
02004             //Perform various checks to make sure the soldier is actually in the same sector, alive, and so on.
02005             //More importantly, the flag to use profile insertion data must be set.
02006             if( gMercProfiles[ i ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ||
02007                         gMercProfiles[ i ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY ||
02008                         gMercProfiles[ i ].bSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ ||
02009                         gMercProfiles[ i ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED ||
02010                         gMercProfiles[ i ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_EPCACTIVE ||
02011 //                gMercProfiles[ i ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_DONT_ADD_TO_SECTOR ||
02012                         !gMercProfiles[ i ].bLife ||
02013                         !gMercProfiles[ i ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo 
02014                   )
02015             { //Don't add, so skip to the next soldier.
02016                   continue;
02017             }
02018             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8)i, FALSE );
02019             if( !pSoldier )
02020             { //Create a new soldier, as this one doesn't exist
02021                   SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
02022                   UINT8                                                 ubID;
02023 
02024                   //Set up the create struct so that we can properly create the profile soldier.
02025                   memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
02026                   MercCreateStruct.bTeam                                = CIV_TEAM;
02027                   MercCreateStruct.ubProfile                      = (UINT8)i;
02028                   MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                             = gWorldSectorX;
02029                   MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                             = gWorldSectorY;
02030                   MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                             = gbWorldSectorZ;
02031 
02032                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &ubID );
02033             }
02034             if ( pSoldier )
02035             { //Now, insert the soldier.
02036                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = gMercProfiles[ i ].ubStrategicInsertionCode;
02037                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = gMercProfiles[ i ].usStrategicInsertionData;
02038                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
02039                   // CJC: Note well that unless an error occurs, UpdateMercInSector calls 
02040                   // AddSoldierToSector
02041                   // AddSoldierToSector( pSoldier->ubID );
02042 
02043                   // check action ID values
02044                   if ( gMercProfiles[ i ].ubQuoteRecord )
02045                   {
02046                         pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord = gMercProfiles[ i ].ubQuoteRecord;
02047                         pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID = gMercProfiles[ i ].ubQuoteActionID;
02048                         if ( pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID == QUOTE_ACTION_ID_CHECKFORDEST )
02049                         {
02050                               // gridno will have been changed to destination... so we're there...
02051                               NPCReachedDestination( pSoldier, FALSE );
02052                         }
02053                   }
02054 
02055                   // make sure this person's pointer is set properly in the init list
02056                   curr = FindSoldierInitListNodeByProfile( pSoldier->ubProfile );
02057                   if ( curr )
02058                   {
02059                         curr->pSoldier = pSoldier;
02060                         curr->ubSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
02061                         // also connect schedules here
02062                         if ( curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID != 0 )
02063                         {
02064                               SCHEDULENODE * pSchedule = GetSchedule( curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID );
02065                               if ( pSchedule )
02066                               {
02067                                     pSchedule->ubSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
02068                                     pSoldier->ubScheduleID = curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID;
02069                               }                       
02070                         }
02071                   }
02072             }
02073       }
02074 }
02075 
02076 void AddProfilesNotUsingProfileInsertionData()
02077 {
02078       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddProfilesNotUsingProfileInsertionData"));
02079       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
02080       //Count the current number of soldiers of the specified team
02081       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
02082       while( curr )
02083       {
02084             if( !curr->pSoldier && 
02085                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && 
02086                         curr->pDetailedPlacement &&
02087                         curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE &&
02088                         !gMercProfiles[ curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo &&
02089                         gMercProfiles[ curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubProfile ].bLife )
02090             {
02091                   AddPlacementToWorld( curr );
02092             }
02093             curr = curr->next;
02094       }
02095 }

02097 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02098 extern void ErrorDetectedInSaveCallback( UINT8 bValue );
02099 
02100 BOOLEAN ValidateSoldierInitLinks( UINT8 ubCode )
02101 {
02102       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
02103       UINT32 uiNumInvalids = 0;
02104       UINT16 str[512];
02105       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
02106       while( curr )
02107       {
02108             if( curr->pSoldier )
02109             {
02110                   if( curr->pSoldier->ubID < 20 && !MercPtrs[ curr->pSoldier->ubID ]->bActive )
02111                   {
02112                         uiNumInvalids++;
02113                   }
02114             }
02115             curr = curr->next;
02116       }
02117       if( uiNumInvalids || ubCode == 4)
02118       {
02119             switch( ubCode )
02120             {
02121                   case 1: //loading save
02122                         swprintf( str, L"Error detected in save file WHILE LOADING.  Please send save and text files associated with save to Kris and Dave."
02123                                                                    L"  After doing so, go back into the game and immediately resave the game which will fix the problem."
02124                                                                    L"  This is the bug responsible for mercs disappearing.  Be prepared to answer lots of questions..." );
02125                         DoSaveLoadMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, ErrorDetectedInSaveCallback );
02126                         break;
02127                   case 2: //saving game
02128                         //swprintf( str, L"Error detected WHILE SAVING file.  Please send save and text files associated with save to Kris and Dave."
02129                         //                                         L"  After doing so, go back into the game and try reloading the new save and saving it again which *could* fix the problem."
02130                         //                                         L"  This is the bug responsible for mercs disappearing.  Be prepared to answer lots of questions..." );
02131                         //if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02132                         //    DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
02133                         //else
02134                         //    DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
02135                         break;
02136                   case 3: //entering sector using temp files (before fade in)
02137                         gfDoDialogOnceGameScreenFadesIn = TRUE;
02138                         break;
02139                   case 4: //after fade in
02140                         gfDoDialogOnceGameScreenFadesIn = FALSE;
02141                         swprintf( str, L"Error detected while entering sector USING TEMP FILES.  Please send previous save and text files associated with save to Kris and Dave."
02142                                                                    L"  After doing so, go back into the game and saving the game, reloading it, and saving it again *could* fix it."
02143                                                                    L"  This is the bug responsible for mercs disappearing.  Be prepared to answer lots of questions..." );
02144                         DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
02145                         break;
02146             }
02147             return FALSE;
02148       }
02149       return TRUE;
02150 }
02151 #endif //betaversion error checking functions

02154 BOOLEAN NewWayOfLoadingEnemySoldierInitListLinks( HWFILE hfile )
02155 {
02156       UINT32 uiNumBytesRead;
02157       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
02158       UINT8 ubSlots, ubSoldierID, ubNodeID;
02159       
02160       FileRead( hfile, &ubSlots, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
02161       if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
02162       {
02163             return FALSE;
02164       }
02165       while( ubSlots-- )
02166       {
02167             FileRead( hfile, &ubNodeID, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
02168             if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
02169             {
02170                   return FALSE;
02171             }
02172             FileRead( hfile, &ubSoldierID, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
02173             if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
02174             {
02175                   return FALSE;
02176             }
02177 
02178             if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
02179             {
02180                   curr = gSoldierInitHead;
02181                   while( curr )
02182                   {
02183                         if( curr->ubNodeID == ubNodeID )
02184                         {
02185                               curr->ubSoldierID = ubSoldierID;
02186                               if( ubSoldierID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID && 
02187                                           ubSoldierID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID )
02188                               { //only enemies and creatures.
02189                                     curr->pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
02190                               }
02191                         }
02192                         curr = curr->next;
02193                   }
02194             }
02195       }
02196       return TRUE;
02197 }

02246 BOOLEAN LookAtButDontProcessEnemySoldierInitListLinks( HWFILE hfile )

02278                               if( ubSoldierID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID && 
02279                                           ubSoldierID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID )
02280                               { //only enemies and creatures.

02282                               }
02283                         }

02285                   }
02286             }
02287       }
02288       return TRUE;

02290 
02291 void StripEnemyDetailedPlacementsIfSectorWasPlayerLiberated()
02292 {
02293       SECTORINFO *pSector;
02294       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
02295       
02296       if( !gfWorldLoaded || gbWorldSectorZ )
02297       { //No world loaded or underground.  Underground sectors don't matter
02298             //seeing enemies (not creatures) never rejuvenate underground.
02299             return;
02300       }
02301 
02302       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
02303 
02304       if( !pSector->uiTimeLastPlayerLiberated )
02305       { //The player has never owned the sector.
02306             return;
02307       }
02308 
02309       //The player has owned the sector at one point.  By stripping all of the detailed placements, only basic 
02310       //placements will remain.  This prevents tanks and "specially detailed" enemies from coming back.
02311       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
02312       while( curr )
02313       {
02314             if( curr->pDetailedPlacement )
02315             {
02316                   if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
02317                   {
02318                         MemFree( curr->pDetailedPlacement );
02319                         curr->pDetailedPlacement = NULL;
02320                         curr->pBasicPlacement->fDetailedPlacement = FALSE;
02321                         curr->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance = FALSE;
02322                         curr->pBasicPlacement->bBodyType = -1;
02323                         RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeAttributeLevel ), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
02324                         RandomizeRelativeLevel( &( curr->pBasicPlacement->bRelativeEquipmentLevel ), curr->pBasicPlacement->ubSoldierClass );
02325                   }
02326             }
02327             curr = curr->next;
02328       }
02329 
02330 }
02331 
02332 //////// 
02333 ////////  For militia squad attack!
02334 ////////
02335 
02336 #define CENTRAL_GRIDNO 13202
02337 #define CENTRAL_RADIUS 30
02338 
02339 void AddSoldierInitListMilitiaOnEdge( UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode, UINT8 ubNumGreen, UINT8 ubNumReg, UINT8 ubNumElites )
02340 {
02341       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02342       MAPEDGEPOINTINFO MapEdgepointInfo;
02343       UINT8 ubCurrSlot;
02344       UINT8 ubTotalSoldiers;
02345       UINT8 bDesiredDirection=0;
02346       switch( ubStrategicInsertionCode )
02347       {
02348             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    bDesiredDirection = SOUTHEAST;                                                            break;
02349             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:           bDesiredDirection = SOUTHWEST;                                                            break;
02350             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    bDesiredDirection = NORTHWEST;                                                            break;
02351             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           bDesiredDirection = NORTHEAST;                                                            break;
02352             default:  AssertMsg( 0, "Illegal direction passed to AddSoldierInitListMilitiaOnEdge()" );      break;
02353       }
02354       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02355             ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Militia reinforcements have arrived!  (%d admins, %d troops, %d elite)", ubNumGreen, ubNumReg, ubNumElites );
02356       #endif
02357 
02358       ubTotalSoldiers = ubNumGreen + ubNumReg + ubNumElites;
02359 
02360       ChooseMapEdgepoints( &MapEdgepointInfo, ubStrategicInsertionCode, (UINT8)(ubNumGreen + ubNumReg + ubNumElites) );
02361       ubCurrSlot = 0;
02362       while( ubTotalSoldiers )
02363       {
02364             if( ubNumElites && Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < ubNumElites )
02365             {
02366                   ubNumElites--;
02367                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
02368                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia(SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA);
02369 
02370                   pSoldier->bOrders = ONGUARD;
02371                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
02372 
02373                   pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_YELLOW;
02374                   pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = (INT16)(CENTRAL_GRIDNO + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) * WORLD_COLS);
02375                   pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
02376                   
02377                   //Setup the position
02378                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
02379                   { //using an edgepoint
02380                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02381                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
02382                   }
02383                   else 
02384                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
02385                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
02386                   }
02387                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
02388             }
02389             else if( ubNumReg && (UINT8)Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < (UINT8)(ubNumElites + ubNumReg) )
02390             {
02391                   ubNumReg--;
02392                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
02393                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia(SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA);
02394 
02395                   pSoldier->bOrders = ONGUARD;
02396                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
02397 
02398                   pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_YELLOW;
02399                   pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = (INT16)(CENTRAL_GRIDNO + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) * WORLD_COLS);
02400                   pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
02401                   
02402                   //Setup the position
02403                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
02404                   { //using an edgepoint
02405                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02406                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
02407                   }
02408                   else 
02409                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
02410                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
02411                   }
02412                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
02413             }
02414             else if( ubNumGreen && (UINT8)Random( ubTotalSoldiers ) < (UINT8)(ubNumElites + ubNumReg + ubNumGreen) )
02415             {
02416                   ubNumGreen--;
02417                   ubTotalSoldiers--;
02418                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia(SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA);
02419 
02420                   pSoldier->bOrders = ONGUARD;
02421                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = bDesiredDirection;
02422 
02423                   pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_YELLOW;
02424                   pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = (INT16)(CENTRAL_GRIDNO + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) + ( Random( CENTRAL_RADIUS * 2 + 1 ) - CENTRAL_RADIUS ) * WORLD_COLS);
02425                   pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
02426 
02427 
02428 //                if ( GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel() < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY + 2 )
02429 //                      gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = TRUE;
02430 //                gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = TRUE;
02431                   
02432                   //Setup the position
02433                   if( ubCurrSlot < MapEdgepointInfo.ubNumPoints )
02434                   { //using an edgepoint
02435                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02436                         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = MapEdgepointInfo.sGridNo[ ubCurrSlot++ ];
02437                   }
02438                   else 
02439                   { //no edgepoints left, so put him at the entrypoint.
02440                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
02441                   }
02442                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
02443             }
02444       }
02445 }
